import sys

for __ in range(input()) :
    n , k = map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
    lists = map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
    dp = [0]*(k+1)
    dp[0]=1
    for i in lists :
        for j in range(k-i,-1,-1) :
            if dp[k] :
                break
            if dp[j] :
                dp[j+i] = 1
    print dp[k]
